snippet: The melee erupted outside Xtreme Lounge, where three people were shot, one of whom died, and two people were slashed, the police said.
abstract: Melee erupts outside Bronx club with crowds of young men pummeling and slashing at one another until gunfire erupts, killing 24-year-old clubgoer Dennis Rodriguez; one male clings to life after bullet struck his head and four others have range of injuries that signals an all-out brawl with an array of weapons.
lead_paragraph: The melee erupted outside Xtreme Lounge, where three people were shot, one of whom died, and two people were slashed, the police said.

headline.main: One Killed and Five Hurt in Fight Outside a Bronx Club
headline.print_headline: One Killed and Five Hurt in Fight Outside a Bronx Club
